name: Gambler's Fate: Prepare to Dice Edition
name_original: Gambler's Fate: Prepare to Dice Edition
description:
Please read for how to play:

use the arrow keys to scroll the map up and down

Your goal in combat is to have your total roll be within the ranges shown on the bar above the enemy.  The greener the bar, the better the outcome.  Hover over each bar to get a tooltip of what the outcome will be for each range.

Press the question mark in the bottom right for more information

Sometimes the first enemies you encounter will be impossible for you to beat with the dice you start with. Sorry! The problems of only having 48 hours.
